text: N’ibiyaga bibiri ntibimeze kumwe n’ikindi, kuko kimwe gifise amazi apfuse y’umusarara amanuka neza mumuhogo, n’ayandi nayo nay’umunyu abishe, no muri ivyo biyaga niho mufungura mwo inyama nshasha nugukura mwo ibisharizo mwambara, no muri ivyo biyaga mubonerayo amato asatura amazi kugira ngo muronkere mwo akamaro kayo kandi muteko muyishimire
